functions.name: Get approved addresses from Contract
functions.description: Returns approved addresses from an instance of the OnchainVerifier Contract

args.name: mergedArguments
args.description: The Address and the Network of the OnchainVerifier Contract (WITH A COMMA AND NO SPACES!)

args.name: contractAddress
args.description: The Address of the OnchainVerifier Contract

args.name: network
args.description: The Network of the OnchainVerifier Contract
